You can't seriously try and equate the defense budget which employs millions of people to giving everyone free liberal arts degrees which will do nothing to advance the country.

How is it an investment? The value of a 4 year degree would continue to plummet with the supply drastically overshadowing the demand. We still need plumbers and electricians. Also, colleges are bloated with useless degrees. Want a degree in gender studies? Sure, but you won't ever get hired.

Free college would have costed TRILLIONS. Not even the same order of magnitude in cost.

Not only do they coincide, but there's been a drastically increasing number of autism diagnoses because of advances in science and being able to diagnose it better. All of this leads to some really strong correlation and anecdotal evidence (oh well there's increased diagnoses of autism so it must be related to the increased number of vaccinations!), but it's all false. The guy who originally wrote the paper linking vaccines to autism falsified some data and was blacklisted from publishing more papers about it. The other authors also retracted their names from the study. If you take any virology or immunology class the professor will tell you it's all crap.

I taught 2 biology labs last year to undergrads (mostly freshmen and sophomores). In the one class I put whatever Pandora station on they wanted over the classroom speakers.
